mdRecord.dcterms:title: Upper Garden, June 1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of the upper garden with two women standing in the boxwood parterre in front of the greenhouse slave quarters. Partial view of the rose house can be seen at far right. A handwritten caption on the reverse reads: Old Garden & Slave Quarters, Mt. Vernon. Provenance provided by the seller indicates the photograph was taken from an album created by a passenger traveling on board the RMS Cedric in June 1904.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (VA : Estate)
Greenhouse Slave Quarters
Conservatory
Upper Garden
